channel.title: The owner of this city (Or members) + other
channel.description:
I would like some members of the below city to please come forward and clarify your intentions as a group of people.
[IMG]http://i293.photobucket.com/albums/mm78/5frtgvhy/citywallcondry.jpg[/img]
I can never seem to catch you in game, but I'm almost certain some of you browse this forum. I'm not happy about the building of walls around my territory (In the black outlines boxes). I was here before the lot of you and you all turn up and start locking me in my own grounds. It's also obvious you plan on extend the wall all around the city which would breach my property.
I hope we can come to some agreement. You've also built your city on my underground networks which also wasn't a very good thing to do. I will try to contact you all further in game. I've been very understanding and patient up to now, and only killed one of you but it has gotten to a point where my resources are being mined by people who are stumbling onto my grounds it also isn't helping because the city has brought forest fires which destroyed every single tree.
I'd also like to hear other peoples opinions on city building, this can range from: Can you just build a city where ever you like, or should you ask permission of the people who lived there first? etc..
Just like to add, I have other bases which are currently not marked on as I don't intend to give away my position.

item.title: The owner of this city (Or members) + other
item.dc:creator: @Divineinfekt Divineinfekt
item.description:
@Divineinfekt wrote:

sorry for the inconvenience, i stopped making stuff on your side.

Read full topic
item.source: The owner of this city (Or members) + other

item.title: The owner of this city (Or members) + other
item.dc:creator: @Debilitation Debilitation
item.description:
@Debilitation wrote:

I live there too, but I don’t go to that side of the city, I mostly stick between my house and badgers…Also I don’t tamper with anything around there… So not me

I did hear Divine saying he wanted to build a city, so you might want to talk to him. Also, you can’t even seem my house on there as it’s further north, and my caves are north as well. (I went north because if I went south, i’d run into you lot.)

Read full topic
item.source: The owner of this city (Or members) + other

item.title: The owner of this city (Or members) + other
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

No I’m pretty sure he meant you can easily use your flint and steel tokill them. However, I’d have taken advantage of the situation if I were you, by setting up random traps around and watching them die etc.

Read full topic
item.source: The owner of this city (Or members) + other

item.title: The owner of this city (Or members) + other
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:8, topic:391515”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=488680.msg3572804#msg3572804 date=1303178425]

This all seems rather professional for a game about blocks…

Well, if someone is imposing on your mineshaft, which limits what you can do with your artistic abilities and starts building a wall around you without your permission, wouldn’t you like answers?

9 out of 10 times, I just kill them.

Tom is one person. According to what I’ve read, there is ~4 people living there.

Anyway, PVP doesn’t solve ANYTHING when it comes to issues like this. They would just retaliate by ganging up on him when his guard is down. Which is why he is trying to solve this issue diplomatically.
[/quote]

Meet my advisor, flint, and his associate, steel. Let us hand this in a diplomatic fashion, shall we?[/quote]

and then you will meet the boss behind it all, Mr. Ban H. Ammer

Read full topic
item.source: The owner of this city (Or members) + other

item.title: The owner of this city (Or members) + other
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:8, topic:391515”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=488680.msg3572804#msg3572804 date=1303178425]

This all seems rather professional for a game about blocks…

Well, if someone is imposing on your mineshaft, which limits what you can do with your artistic abilities and starts building a wall around you without your permission, wouldn’t you like answers?

9 out of 10 times, I just kill them.

Tom is one person. According to what I’ve read, there is ~4 people living there.

Anyway, PVP doesn’t solve ANYTHING when it comes to issues like this. They would just retaliate by ganging up on him when his guard is down. Which is why he is trying to solve this issue diplomatically.
[/quote]

Meet my advisor, flint, and his associate, steel. Let us hand this in a diplomatic fashion, shall we?[/quote]

And then the other players will accuse him of griefing. He would lose his credibility as a moderator and be banned at the same time.

I’m sure you’re implying in setting their city on fire.

Read full topic

item.title: The owner of this city (Or members) + other
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:2, topic:391515”]I am a resident of that… city as you call it.

Although im quite sure i am not the one infringing on your underground network as i have setup my residence in the far northwest corner of the area.

I have setup a small mine under my house but so far i have run into nothing that seems to be a network, rather just rogue caves.

at this point i cannot account for the others who reside with me (kaitou, asshole_rule, Aliases)

I am also not a part of that wall construction, consult with divinefekts as he might know whats going on, he also owns that semi castle up on the hill.[/quote]

Ah, I see. If you could please ask divinefekts to respond to this thread, that would be great.

Read full topic
